title: SEC’s Advisor Rules Face Long Battle
text:
The SEC’s investment advice reform package faces an extended legal battle that is unlikely to be resolved before the new regulations must be implemented next year, writes InvestmentNews.

“Although the outcome is impossible to predict, it will hinge on whether a court decides the SEC ignored a congressional mandate to set a uniform fiduciary standard for all financial advisers or acted within its authority to create a new broker requirement separate from the investment adviser standard,” writes InvestmentNews.

...
description: Courts will decide whether the SEC ignored a Congressional mandate to create uniform rules for brokers and advisors.
